channel.title: Comments on: Please Mr. DBA, Change default passwords and use strong passwords
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: ca8msm
item.dc:creator: ca8msm
item.description: Our server team have just rejected two different system installations (after they had been given the go ahead at a corporate level) due to their need to run with system admin privileges.
item.content:encoded: Our server team have just rejected two different system installations (after they had been given the go ahead at a corporate level) due to their need to run with system admin privileges.

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.content:encoded:
Yup and the regular scan tells you about blanks

(SA)**** Server present with blank SA password! ****

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: sqlping is also very nice to use to 'guess' the password when you use a dictionary attack
item.content:encoded: sqlping is also very nice to use to ‘guess’ the password when you use a dictionary attack

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
Password? I use sa and a blank password…..I guess people learned their lesson after the Slammer worm

The sad thing is that there is a ton of software out there that requires the sa login for it to work
